dict.acceptation: 相比，匹敌；比较，区别；比拟（常与to连用）；

sent.orig: You can compare search result positions for each keyword and you can compare ad performance.
sent.trans: 您可以比较搜索结果的立场，并为每个关键字，您可以比较广告效果。

sent.orig: Compare all versions – Clicking the Compare button performs an action similar to merging documents together.
sent.trans: 比较所有版本-点一下比较按钮，执行一个类似合并文档的操作。

sent.orig: To whom, then, will you compare God? What image will you compare him to?
sent.trans: 18你们究竟将谁比神、用甚麽形像与神比较呢。

sent.orig: The method then was used to measure and compare the EBC-ROS concentration in nonsmokers and smokers.
sent.trans: 进一步以本研究的采样分析方法用于测量及比较抽菸者与非抽菸者的EBC-ROS浓度。

sent.orig: Methods: Using Pharmacognostical method to observe and compare the characters of Cortex ailanthus and Cortex sinensis.
sent.trans: 方法：按生药学常规方法对臭椿皮与香椿皮进行对比研究。
